scripts.install:all: yarn run install:web && yarn run install:utils
scripts.install:web: npx lerna exec --scope people-admin -- pnpm install
scripts.install:utils: npx lerna exec --scope javascript-validate-utils -- pnpm install
scripts.dev:web: npx lerna exec --scope people-admin -- yarn dev
scripts.build:utils: npx lerna exec --scope javascript-validate-utils -- yarn build
